Paragraph.Text: This help guide lists all of the controls available in FortressCraft Evolved, don't worry if you are feeling overwhelmed at first, just refer to the essential controls section to get started.
Some controls are unavailable until you have completed the tutorial.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left:
W, A, S & D: Movement Space: Jump H: This Help Guide Escape: Main Menu
X: Switch to Build Gun LMB: Build Block RMB: Remove Block
M: Switch to Scanning Tool LMB: Material Ping RMB: Scan Block
TwoColumnParagraph.Right:
I: Open Inventory C: Open Self Crafting F: Fire Grappling Hook G: Toss Glowstick
E: Interact With Machine Q: Extract From Machine R: Rotate Machine
V: Switch to Ray Gun LMB: Fire RMB: Charged Shot

Paragraph.Text: (LMB = Left Mouse Button, RMB = Right Mouse Button)
Most controls can be customised from the game launcher. In-game hints will not reflect these changes.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: W: Move Forwards S: Move Backwards A: Strafe Left D: Strafe Right
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Space: Jump Mouse: Look Around U: Ride Minecart Z: Zoom

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: X: Switch to Build Gun V: Switch to Ray Gun B: Switch to Steadycam
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: N: Switch to Paint Gun M: Switch to Scanning Tool Shift + Mouse Wheel: Cycle Tools

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: I: Open Inventory F1-F7: Select Hotbar Tab 1-9 & 0: Select Hotbar Slot Q : Drop Highlighted item
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Shift + Drag: Split Stack Control + Wheel: Cycle Tabs Mouse Wheel: Cycle Slots --

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: C: Open Self Crafting L: Toggle Head Lamp J: Toggle Jetpack (needs crafting) F: Fire Grappling Hook
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: G: Toss Glowstick K: Toggle Holobase View U: Toggle Holobase Mode Space: Release Grappling Hook

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: E: Interact with Machine T: Store in Machine R: Rotate Machine Clockwise ]: Rotate Machine Clockwise
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Q: Extract from Machine Shift-T: Store 10 Items Shift-E: Hopper Vacuum Mode [: Rotate Machine Anti-clockwise

Paragraph.Text: Enter: Show Chat Window Right Shift: Show Server Information Right Shift + F1, F2 or F3: Set Network Rate

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: LMB: Build Block RMB: Remove Block MMB : Pick Current Block
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: Control + LMB: Build-To-Me Control + Hold RMB: Super Dig

Paragraph.Text: Left Mouse Button: Ping Surroundings Right Mouse Button: Scan Block Mouse Wheel: Change Ping Setting

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Escape: Main Menu Ctrl-M: Toggle music
